author: NBCNews.com
title: Ocasio-Cortez and 'the squad' rally to push Biden on bold climate action
description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Rep. Ilhan Omar, and Rep. Rashida Tlaib spoke at a rally encouraging President-elect Joe Biden to take bold action on climate initiatives.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Watch: Reporters shout questions as White House coronavirus task force briefing ends without Q&A
description: As the first White House coronavirus task force briefing in four months ended without any panel member taking questions from the press, reporters shouted questions at Vice President Pence and his team as they exited the room.
source.name: NBC News

title: Holiday blockbusters head to streaming services amid pandemic
description: “Wonder Woman 1984” is now heading to HBO Max and movie theaters as production studios figure out what to do with their blockbuster films.

author: Phil Helsel
title: Smithsonian museums, National Zoo closing again
description: The National Zoo and all Smithsonian museums are closing again due to the Covid-19 pandemic. They had closed in March, so Monday's closing affects the zoo and seven facilities that had reopened since then.
content:
Those hoping to visit the National Zoo in Washington, D.C. and other Smithsonian facilities during the holidays could be out of luck as the Covid-19 pandemic will close them starting Monday.
